DOC.brief_summary: To determine the ideal sexual abstinence time for producing high quality sperm
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of the Sexual Abstinence Period on the Production of Reactive Oxygen Species in Patients Who Planned to Take Part in Intrauterine Insemination
DOC.criteria: Patients who had made an application to Gazi University Obstetrics and Gynecology clinic for infertility and planned to have IUI (intrauterine insemination) Erectile dysfunction improper semen collection
